title: For Sale or Trade - T201 Cobb/Crawford PSA6
author: KODIAK

posts.post_title: For Sale or Trade - T201 Cobb/Crawford PSA6
posts.post_content:
I have for sale or trade a T201 Cobb/Crawford PSA6.  Am asking $1125 but would prefer to trade for SGC graded T206 cards - especially HOF or SL's.  If interested or if you would like to see scans please contact me at [url]dmjthomps913@att.net[/url]

Thanks for your interest,
Dave
